Description: Water is the base ingredient in most skincare products, serving as a solvent to dissolve other ingredients and form the product base.
Glycerin is a humectant that draws moisture into the skin, helping to keep it hydrated and supple.
This fatty alcohol acts as an emollient, softening and smoothing the skin by forming a protective barrier to prevent moisture loss.
Dimethicone is a silicone-based emollient that forms a protective barrier on the skin's surface, helping to lock in moisture and improve skin texture.
Stearic acid functions as both an emulsifier and a surfactant, helping to stabilize and blend the ingredients in skincare formulations, while also cleansing the skin by removing dirt and oil.

Glyceryl stearate acts as both an emollient and an emulsifier, helping to soften and smooth the skin while also stabilizing the formulation by ensuring proper mixing of oil and water-based ingredients.
Sodium lauryl sulfate is a surfactant that creates foam and lather in skincare products, helping to cleanse the skin by removing dirt, oil, and impurities.
Sodium laureth sulfate is a surfactant similar to SLS, used to create foam and lather in skincare products for effective cleansing.
Propylene glycol acts as a humectant, attracting moisture to the skin, while also serving as a solvent to dissolve other ingredients in skincare formulations.
Butylene glycol is a humectant that helps to hydrate the skin by attracting moisture, while also serving as a solvent to dissolve other ingredients in skincare products.
Phenoxyethanol is a widely used preservative in skincare products to prevent the growth of bacteria and fungi, ensuring product safety and longevity.
Ethylhexylglycerin is a preservative booster that enhances the efficacy of other preservatives, allowing for lower concentrations of potentially irritating preservatives like phenoxyethanol.
Caprylic/capric triglyceride is a lightweight emollient derived from coconut oil, providing moisturizing benefits to the skin without feeling heavy or greasy.
Shea butter is a rich emollient and moisturizer that nourishes and hydrates the skin, leaving it soft, smooth, and protected.
Jojoba oil is a lightweight moisturizer rich in antioxidants and fatty acids, helping to soothe and hydrate the skin while also protecting it from environmental damage.
Cyclomethicone is a lightweight silicone-based emollient and solvent that provides a smooth, silky texture to skincare formulations, while also helping to dissolve other ingredients.
Hyaluronic acid is a powerful humectant that attracts and retains moisture in the skin, helping to plump and hydrate the skin's surface for a smoother, more youthful appearance.
Tocopherol, or vitamin E, is a potent antioxidant that helps to protect the skin from free radical damage caused by UV radiation and environmental stressors, helping to prevent premature aging.
Retinol, a form of vitamin A, is a potent antioxidant that helps to stimulate collagen production, reduce wrinkles, and improve skin texture and tone.
Ascorbic acid, or vitamin C, is a powerful antioxidant that helps to brighten the skin, fade dark spots, and protect against UV damage, promoting a more even and radiant complexion.
Salicylic acid is a beta hydroxy acid (BHA) that exfoliates the skin by dissolving dead skin cells and unclogging pores, helping to treat acne and prevent breakouts.
Lactic acid is an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that exfoliates the skin by loosening the bonds between dead skin cells, promoting cell turnover and revealing smoother, brighter skin.
Glycolic acid is an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that exfoliates the skin by dissolving the bonds between dead skin cells, revealing smoother, more radiant skin and improving overall skin texture.
Niacinamide, or vitamin B3, helps to brighten the skin, fade dark spots, and even out skin tone, while also reducing inflammation and strengthening the skin's barrier function.
Panthenol, or pro-vitamin B5, is a humectant that attracts and retains moisture in the skin, helping to hydrate and soothe dry, irritated skin, while also reducing inflammation.
Allantoin is a soothing and moisturizing agent that helps to calm and hydrate the skin, promoting healing and reducing irritation.
Ceramides are lipid molecules that help to strengthen the skin's barrier function, locking in moisture and protecting the skin from environmental damage and dehydration.
Aloe vera extract is a natural soothing agent that helps to calm and hydrate the skin, reducing redness, inflammation, and irritation.
Sodium hyaluronate is a form of hyaluronic acid that helps to hydrate and plump the skin by attracting and retaining moisture, promoting a smoother, more supple complexion.
Benzoyl peroxide is an antimicrobial agent that kills acne-causing bacteria and helps to unclog pores, making it an effective treatment for acne and blemishes.
Zinc oxide is a mineral UV filter that provides broad-spectrum protection against UVA and UVB rays, while also soothing and calming the skin, making it suitable for sensitive or irritated skin.
Titanium dioxide is a mineral UV filter that provides broad-spectrum protection against UVA and UVB rays, helping to prevent sunburn and premature aging of the skin.
Ferulic acid is a potent antioxidant that helps to protect the skin from free radical damage caused by UV radiation and environmental stressors.
Green tea extract is rich in antioxidants and anti-inflammatory properties, helping to protect the skin from damage caused by free radicals and soothe irritation.
Alpha arbutin is a skin-lightening agent that helps to fade dark spots and hyperpigmentation, promoting a more even and radiant complexion.
Kojic acid is a natural skin-lightening agent derived from mushrooms, helping to fade dark spots and hyperpigmentation for a more even skin tone.
Arbutin is a natural skin-lightening agent that helps to fade dark spots and hyperpigmentation, promoting a more even and radiant complexion.
Licorice extract contains compounds that help to brighten the skin, fade dark spots, and reduce inflammation, making it suitable for sensitive or irritated skin.
Resveratrol is a powerful antioxidant found in grapes and red wine, helping to protect the skin from free radical damage and reduce the signs of aging.
Coenzyme Q10 is a potent antioxidant that helps to protect the skin from damage caused by free radicals and environmental stressors, reducing the signs of aging.
Retinyl palmitate is a form of vitamin A that helps to stimulate collagen production, reduce wrinkles, and improve skin texture and tone.
Squalane is a lightweight moisturizer derived from squalene, a natural component of human sebum, helping to hydrate and soften the skin without clogging pores.
Cetyl alcohol acts as an emollient, softening and smoothing the skin by forming a protective barrier to prevent moisture loss.
Isopropyl myristate is an emollient that helps to soften and smooth the skin, improving its texture and appearance.
Sodium PCA is a natural moisturizing factor (NMF) found in the skin, helping to attract and retain moisture, promoting hydration and skin elasticity.
Urea is a natural moisturizing factor (NMF) that helps to attract and retain moisture in the skin, promoting hydration and preventing dryness and flakiness.
Sorbitol is a humectant that helps to hydrate the skin by attracting moisture from the environment, promoting soft, smooth, and supple skin.
Saccharide isomerate is a plant-derived moisturizer and humectant that helps to attract and retain moisture in the skin, promoting hydration and improving skin elasticity.
Lecithin is a lipid-derived emollient that helps to soften and smooth the skin, improving its texture and appearance.
Trehalose is a sugar-derived moisturizer that helps to hydrate and protect the skin, promoting elasticity and preventing moisture loss.
Xanthan gum is a natural polysaccharide that helps to thicken and stabilize skincare formulations, improving their texture and consistency.
Carbomer is a synthetic polymer that helps to thicken and stabilize skincare formulations, improving their texture and consistency.
Acrylates/C10-30 alkyl acrylate crosspolymer is a synthetic polymer that helps to thicken and stabilize skincare formulations, improving their texture and consistency.
Sodium polyacrylate is a synthetic polymer that helps to thicken and stabilize skincare formulations, improving their texture and consistency.
Hydroxyethylcellulose is a plant-derived polymer that helps to thicken and stabilize skincare formulations, improving their texture and consistency.
Ceteareth-20 is an emulsifying agent that helps to blend oil and water-based ingredients in skincare formulations, improving their stability and texture.
Butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter is a rich emollient and moisturizer that nourishes and hydrates the skin, leaving it soft, smooth, and protected.
Tocopheryl acetate, or vitamin E acetate, is a stable form of vitamin E that helps to protect the skin from free radical damage caused by UV radiation and environmental stressors.
Tetrahexyldecyl ascorbate is a stable form of vitamin C that helps to brighten the skin, fade dark spots, and protect against UV damage, promoting a more even and radiant complexion.
N-hydroxysuccinimide is a peptide that helps to reduce the appearance of dark circles and under-eye puffiness by targeting the underlying causes of discoloration.
Chrysin is a flavonoid antioxidant that helps to reduce the appearance of dark circles and under-eye puffiness by targeting the breakdown of hemoglobin and improving circulation.
Palmitoyl oligopeptide is a peptide that helps to stimulate collagen production and improve skin elasticity, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Palmitoyl tetrapeptide-7 is a peptide that helps to reduce inflammation and improve skin firmness and elasticity, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Palmitoyl tripeptide-1 is a peptide that helps to stimulate collagen production and improve skin elasticity, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Acetyl hexapeptide-8, also known as argireline, is a peptide that helps to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines by relaxing facial muscles and preventing repetitive facial movements.
Tetrapeptide-30 is a peptide that helps to reduce the appearance of dark spots and hyperpigmentation by inhibiting melanin production and promoting a more even skin tone.
Tetrapeptide-21 is a peptide that helps to stimulate collagen production and improve skin elasticity, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Palmitoyl pentapeptide-4 is a peptide that helps to stimulate collagen production and improve skin firmness and elasticity, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Palmitoyl tripeptide-38 is a peptide that helps to stimulate collagen production and improve skin elasticity, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Palmitoyl tripeptide-5 is a peptide that helps to stimulate collagen production and improve skin firmness and elasticity, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Copper peptide is a peptide that helps to stimulate collagen production and improve skin elasticity, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Matrixyl 3000 is a peptide blend that helps to stimulate collagen production and improve skin firmness and elasticity, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Matrixyl Synthe'6 is a peptide that helps to stimulate collagen production and improve skin firmness and elasticity, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Argireline is a peptide that helps to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines by relaxing facial muscles and preventing repetitive facial movements.
Hexapeptide-10 is a peptide that helps to stimulate collagen production and improve skin firmness and elasticity, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Hexapeptide-9 is a peptide that helps to stimulate collagen production and improve skin firmness and elasticity, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Acetyl tetrapeptide-5 is a peptide that helps to reduce the appearance of under-eye puffiness and dark circles by improving lymphatic circulation and reducing fluid retention.
Water is the base ingredient in most skincare products, serving as a solvent to dissolve other ingredients and form the product base.
1,2-Hexanediol is a solvent that helps to dissolve other ingredients in skincare formulations and acts as a humectant, attracting moisture to the skin.
Steartrimonium methosulfate functions as a surfactant and emulsifier, helping to cleanse the skin by removing dirt and oil while also stabilizing skincare formulations.

Alcohol acts as a solvent to dissolve other ingredients in skincare products and also functions as an astringent, helping to tone and tighten the skin. However, it can be drying and irritating to some skin types.
Charcoal powder absorbs excess oil and impurities from the skin, helping to detoxify and clarify the complexion. It is commonly used in skincare products for oily and acne-prone skin.
Betaine is a humectant that attracts moisture to the skin, helping to hydrate and soften the skin's surface. It also functions as a moisturizer, improving skin texture and elasticity.
Cellulose is a plant-derived ingredient used as a viscosity agent and texture enhancer in skincare formulations, improving the product's texture and consistency.

Citric acid is an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that exfoliates the skin by loosening the bonds between dead skin cells, promoting cell turnover and revealing smoother, brighter skin. It also functions as a pH adjuster in skincare formulations.
Disodium EDTA is a chelating agent that helps to stabilize skincare formulations by binding to metal ions, preventing them from causing product degradation and maintaining product efficacy.
Dipropylene glycol is a solvent that helps to dissolve other ingredients in skincare formulations and acts as a humectant, attracting moisture to the skin.
Ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate is a chemical UV filter that absorbs and filters UVB rays from the sun, helping to prevent sunburn and protect the skin from UV damage.
Niacinamide, or vitamin B3, helps to brighten the skin, fade dark spots, and even out skin tone, while also reducing inflammation and strengthening the skin's barrier function.
Glyceryl stearate SE acts as both an emulsifier and a surfactant, helping to stabilize and blend the ingredients in skincare formulations, while also cleansing the skin by removing dirt and oil.
Isoamyl p-methoxycinnamate is a chemical UV filter that absorbs and filters UVB rays from the sun, helping to prevent sunburn and protect the skin from UV damage.
Cyclopentasiloxane is a silicone-based emollient and solvent that provides a smooth, silky texture to skincare formulations, while also helping to dissolve other ingredients.
Cyclohexasiloxane is a silicone-based emollient and solvent that provides a smooth, silky texture to skincare formulations, while also helping to dissolve other ingredients.
Olive fruit oil is a rich emollient derived from olives, providing intense hydration and nourishment to the skin, leaving it soft, smooth, and protected.
Sunflower seed oil is a lightweight emollient rich in antioxidants and fatty acids, helping to nourish and hydrate the skin, while also protecting it from environmental damage.
PEG-100 stearate acts as both an emulsifier and a surfactant, helping to stabilize and blend the ingredients in skincare formulations, while also cleansing the skin by removing dirt and oil.
Beeswax is a natural emollient and occlusive agent that helps to soften and smooth the skin, while also forming a protective barrier to lock in moisture and prevent moisture loss.
Arginine is an amino acid that helps to hydrate and protect the skin, while also providing antioxidant benefits to fight against free radical damage and premature aging.
Ceramide NP is a lipid molecule that helps to strengthen the skin's barrier function, locking in moisture and protecting the skin from environmental damage and dehydration.
Lauryl glucoside is a mild surfactant derived from coconut oil and glucose, helping to cleanse the skin by removing dirt and oil without stripping away its natural oils.
Disodium cocoamphodiacetate is a mild surfactant and conditioning agent that helps to cleanse the skin by removing dirt and oil, while also conditioning and softening the skin.
Acrylates copolymer forms a film on the skin's surface, helping to lock in moisture and improve the longevity of skincare products, while also enhancing their texture and consistency.
Coco-glucoside is a mild surfactant derived from coconut oil and glucose, helping to cleanse the skin by removing dirt and oil without stripping away its natural oils.
Cocamidopropyl betaine is a mild surfactant derived from coconut oil, helping to cleanse the skin by removing dirt and oil without causing irritation or dryness.
Sodium chloride, or table salt, is used as a viscosity agent in skincare formulations to thicken the product and improve its texture and consistency.
